case.state: So who runs this dump, the Gambling Club president? Whatever, let's do this, Senketsu!
If you think strip poker's gonna stop me, you're nuts! You ready, Senketsu?
I'm the last girl that's gonna be scared off by a little stripping! C'mon, Senketsu!
You ready, Senketsu? Let's teach these jerks we mean business!
I can handle this club no problem! Let's get started already!
(Ryuko, calm down and assess the situation.) Hey, I've got this!
This place is nothin' like Honnouji...'cept for the weird energy in the air.
(Be careful, Ryuko. Challenging you to strip poker is likely a plot to separate us.) Hey, I know that!
Hey, I don't have all day! Are we gonna fight or what?
This is just gonna turn into a fight soon anyway, right? C'mon.
Can't ya tell, Creeper? It's not like I got any tricks up my sleeve...or on me.
Why don't ya go ahead n' guess? Talk it over with chat for a while instead a' buggin' me.
Oh, I got one layer in particular that'll blow up your little livestream, weirdo--but we'll get there.
Shouldn't you know pervs pretty well? They don't care what's on a girl's mind.
Tch, yeah they are. All the boys in school just cheer on my boobs--they don't care why I'm fighting.
Hear that, Senketsu? The creeper girl thinks I got personality, too. (You do.)
Feelin' good, Senketsu? We gave Camera Girl a real show, huh?
That get guys flocking to your little stream? It better have!
(You're so cool, Ryuko! I bet Streaming-chan got a good shot of your boobs!)
Aww, did your fans not like that, Streamer? Well, why don't they say it to my face?
H-hey, I just cleaned Mako's clock on accident, n' they're not happy with that?
Jeez, your fans are even scummier than you are. This outfit's not enough for 'em?
I'm not finished yet--n' you can tell that to the pervs watchin', too!
Smooth sailing? I'll smooth out your face--!
(I will be your "small stuff," Ryuko! Pay Streaming-chan no mind!) Senketsu--!
Stupid camera creeper, stupid pervs--I'm winnin' this game to stick it to 'em!
(If I can shield your modesty from the camera, Ryuko, I will!) ...Sure.
...Do I really look that good? Like, your chat thinks I'm--cute? Stupid...
...~cards~. Damn it, don't look at her camera...
...~cards~. I guess.
Ah, jeez, I dunno...~cards~.
(Take ~cards~, Ryuko.) Hey, I know how to play!
(~cards~ cards.) I know tha--hey, good call.
...Whatever.
~cards~. ...Hey, I don't have all day!
~cards~. ...Hey, Senketsu, you're itching a little.
This part's so boring...
When's the last time I played poker anyway? I don't know what I'm doing...
...OK, pairs are good. ~cards~.
I'm feelin' this swap. ~cards~.
Call me batshit crazy, but...~cards~!
Wha...~cards~.
~cards~. ...~cards~.
~cards~. And if they're bad, you're gonna eat crap!
Uhh...~cards~, I guess. I'm not a poker player.
~cards~, Ryuko. Your blood is tasting odd.
~cards~, Senketsu? (~cards~.)
Are you gonna swap me or not? Hurry up!
Hit me. ...For real if you wanna see what happens.
~cards~...c'mon, don't make me keep askin'.
~cards~ is all I'm gonna need to take you down!
What's this crap? ~cards~.
Do we really have to keep goin' through this crap? What's the point of this game?
'Soon as I figure out where the leader is, I'm...ugh, gimme ~cards~.
Dealer's pissin' me off...~cards~!
...~cards~? ~cards~. ...Yeah.
(Ryuko! Take ~cards~! The Ryuko in my head took ~cards~!)
(Ryuko will take ~cards~!)
(Don't be afraid, Ryuko! Your hand'll be great!)
(Ryuko is the best poker player around! She's the best everything around! ~cards~!)
Bang! 100% Life Fibers, baby--that's a Kamui for ya!
You dumbasses didn't even know I was goin' easy on ya! Now you gotta deal with me and Senketsu synchronized!
I said no more Miss Nice Girl, and I meant it! Say hello to 100% Life Fiber Synchronization!
You think those piddly little Goku Uniforms are tough? They barely scratch 30% Life Fibers--Senketsu here is 100%!
That bitch Satsuki Kiryuin ain't the only girl with a Kamui! And I wear mine a hell of a lot better!
You ready to go, Senketsu? Let's show these pervs just who they're dealin' with!
I like finishin' fights quickly--so congrats, you made me transform! Let's see how you like me n' Senketsu synchronized!
Let's see how you handle my Kamui! This thing's a cut above Goku Uniforms--and it's payin' dividends already!
How d'you like me now? Aww, that not count as a strip? I'm showin' more skin, aren't I?
...OK, now what? Senketsu can't come apart...and my Scissor Blade was all I had left for small crap!
...I guess that's the only thing I coulda dropped anyway, huh? We better think a' somethin', Senketsu...
What, you think I'm helpless without that thing? Senketsu Senjin!
It's gonna take more than losin' my Scissor Blade to take us down! Senketsu Senjin!
I bet I woulda dropped that thing by accident anyway. I can never hold onto it...
Think you can take me without my Scissor Bl--(I'll protect you, Ryuko! You're too awesome to lose!)
(You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!)
(Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!)
(Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!)
(Halt! This hand is great, so Ryuko won't be stripping! But if she did, she wouldn't do it alone!)
(Ryuko is cool and will never have to strip anyway! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!)
...What're you lookin' at, ~player~? I'm fine.
Hehe. Never played poker much, but even I know this is great.
...Hey Senketsu, you got a good poker face, right?
This is a good hand, right? ...Senketsu? (Yes. It is of higher value than--) Yeah, got it.
(Ryuko, your heartbeat is rapid. Is this sexual interest?) W-what? No, my hand's good, that's all!
Poker face? Who do you take me for, that bitch Satsuki Kiryuin? I got a lot to be mad about.
Hey, the good stuff's just rollin' in, Senketsu! I knew this game would be a cakewalk!
(Ryuko--! ...I have to use the bathroom! But I'm rooting for you!) Uh...thanks?
Good, easy round. Who are all you people, anyway, huh?
I like what I'm seein'...too bad I can't just keep it.
Senketsu, this is good, right? (Perhaps I should have taught you poker this afternoon.)
Hey, Senketsu, how come you're so good at poker anyway? (Dr. Matoi designed me as your guide in all intellectual pursuits.)
Ryuko has a great hand this round, so her socks aren't going anywhere! And you'll never know thanks to her poker face!
OK, easy round. Senketsu, do I have any homework tonight? (Do you plan on doing it?) ...No.
...Hey, Senketsu, be my poker face for a bit, would ya?
You think I'm gonna spill how my hand's great? Why don't I just...uh...shit.
Now these're the kinda cards I deserve, with all the crap I put up with...
Man, this game's easy! It's just like when we cheat on tests! (...You really ought to study more.)
(I watched my dad play poker once to cheat some guy out of his money! And I'm pretty sure Ryuko's hand is as good as whatever he had)!
I feel more in sync with you than ever, Senketsu! There's nobody at this table who can stop us now!
What's the matter? Am I too much for ya to look at like this? I'm used to the whole school oglin' me at this point.
(Ryuko! You're transformed and cooler than ever! Did your boobs get bigger? Your hand is better, too!)
There's somethin' you can never strip offa me: the will to fight!
Damn right this is skimpy. If I gotta dress like a stripper to go full power, then that's what it takes! My hands are better already!
Hey, Senketsu, I know this hand's a winner, but stop suckin' me dry. (It's flowing faster than usual...)
Hate to break it to ya, but you're not beatin' this, sword or no sword.
Somethin' on my face? I'm doin' fine...hope you're not distracted.
No complaints here. Well, you're all pervs I ought to pummel, but the hand's good.
Told ya I wouldn't need a sword to cut your asses up! Me n' Senketsu's power is still goin' strong!
Hope ya don't mind a little zettai ryouiki in your poker match. ...That's the phrase, right?
Hehe...I was really worried about ya back there, Senketsu. (...I'm thirsty, Ryuko.)
The hands're still rollin' in for me just fine! Told ya I'd win!
Can't believe I played this far in...but at least I got somethin' to work with.
W-well, how do I look, huh? You pervs got me down to my underwear, and I think I wear it pretty well!
Thought you were gonna stomp me without Senketsu? This hand's got other plans--and so do my fists!
Well, the best strategy is to just charge ahead n' blow 'em away! C'mon!
Stare at my boobs if you want, pervert. I'm winnin' this round either way.
Hey, what's with the sudden good stuff, Dealer? You just wanted to get my bra off or somethin'?
You wanna take a swing at me n' get your clock cleaned, or just play this hand n' strip? Your move.
Wish I wasn't topless, but I guess these're pretty good.
That's what I'm talkin' about! Don't count on gettin' my panties off, creeps!
I know I ain't that tall, but let's see you beat me in a fight, huh? Come on!
Coulda come sooner, I guess, but I'll take a second chance in a fight.
Hey, just in time, Dealer! Maybe I won't kick your ass after this!
Y'know what? Took all my clothes comin' off, but I think I'm gettin' the hang a' poker after all! Bring it!
Oh, am I blushin' 'cause I'm butt-naked? Yeah, sure hope that saves ya this round.
Bang! 100% Life Fibers, baby--that's a Kamui for ya!
You dumbasses didn't even know I was goin' easy on ya! Now you gotta deal with me and Senketsu synchronized!
I said no more Miss Nice Girl, and I meant it! Say hello to 100% Life Fiber Synchronization!
You think those piddly little Goku Uniforms are tough? They barely scratch 30% Life Fibers--Senketsu here is 100%!
That bitch Satsuki Kiryuin ain't the only girl with a Kamui! And I wear mine a hell of a lot better!
You ready to go, Senketsu? Let's show these pervs just who they're dealin' with!
I like finishin' fights quickly--so congrats, you made me transform! Let's see how you like me n' Senketsu synchronized!
How d'you like me now? Aww, that not count as a strip? I'm showin' more skin, aren't I?
...OK, now what? Senketsu can't come apart...and my Scissor Blade was all I had left for small crap!
...I guess that's the only thing I coulda dropped anyway, huh? We better think a' somethin', Senketsu...
What, you think I'm helpless without that thing? Senketsu Senjin!
It's gonna take more than losin' my Scissor Blade to take us down! Senketsu Senjin!
I bet I woulda dropped that thing by accident anyway. I can never hold onto it...
Think you can take me without my Scissor Bl--(I'll protect you, Ryuko! You're too awesome to lose!)
(You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!)
(Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!)
(Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!)
(Halt! This hand is so-so, and that's all Ryuko needs because she's awesome! But if she loses, she won't lose alone!)
(Ryuko is cool and will never have to strip anyway! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!)
Stupid game...why'm I playin' this? Can't your leader come out and fight me?
I don't like the looks a' this place...and why're there so many girls around?
...You feel it too, don't you, Senketsu? Somethin's off about this whole building...
Looks like I'm doin' pretty well so far. You chumps woulda been better off just fightin' me--it'd be over quicker.
(Ryuko! I have no idea how to play cards but good luck! You can beat these guys!)
Maybe you don't know, but I'm a celebrity at Honnouji--as the girl who's gonna take Satsuki Kiryuin down! You're all nothin' to me.
(I would be wary of ~player~, Ryuko. The energy she gives off is unlike anyone else here.) Hey, I scoped her out, don't worry!
(I would be wary of ~player~, Ryuko. The energy he gives off is unlike anyone else here.) Hey, I scoped him out, don't worry!
(You think losing her shoes will scare Ryuko? Ryuko's fought the great Lady Satsuki to a standstill! You're nothing to her!)
This is just some average crap hand...I'm runnin' outta patience already!
I know I gotta keep my cool, Senketsu...but I really just wanna transform and squash these guys.
Maybe I oughta be happier with average hands--looks like the good stuff's hard to come by.
OK, Senketsu, we just have to not lose each round, right? So this is probably OK? (Probably. Read your opponents' emotions).
I'm a lot more interested in breakin' faces than readin' 'em, y'know...!
Why's this place gimme the creeps, huh? Like there's a weird aura. (I can still taste your blood for now, Ryuko...)
I gotta study up on card games. If I can figure out the official Honnouji Academy Rulebook, it oughta be cake.
Damn it, I've worked up an appetite already, just watchin' these idiots...
You sure are a chatty bunch, arent'cha? Why don't you try n' talk your way outta a fight?
I'm more of a war-face girl than a poker face...
This hand ain't anything spectacular, Senketsu, so you might wanna get all your threads in order.
(Ryuko! Do you need some lunch? I'll do a speech so you can have a lunch break!) I'm fine, Mako, thanks.
I got homework tonight, y'know. I mean, I wasn't gonna do it, but...
I think you oughta stare at your cards instead a' me...unless you wanna lose even harder.
Yeah, yeah, drink in the view a' my boobs, why don't ya? All that matters is that I'm at full power now--and I'm gonna win this thing!
Impressed? Senketsu's got a few other forms, too--but you ain't worth 'em.
This whole place is givin' me a bad vibe. It's not crazy like Honnouji, but it's still full a' weirdos...
(Ryuko will you cut my hair later? You're really good at it!) Uh...sure.
You feel it more than ever, right, Senketsu? The air in this place is all charged-up somehow...!
(I am Lady Ryuko's impenetrable shield! MAKO MANKANSHOKU!)
Where'd my Scissor Blade land? If someone runs off with it, I swear...
Great, now I'm missin' both halves of the Scissor Blade...
Yeah, yeah, so you tagged me once. I bought enough time to figure out your little strategies.
I got other sharp edges than my Scissor Blade--and I'm fixin' to test 'em out on somebody here!
Guess I can't just slice your uniforms off anymore. Maybe I'll deck ya instead...
...Hey, Senketsu? (Yes?) Bein' synced is a lot comfier than it used to be.
(Ryuko's too cool to show you her boobs! Gaze upon the cleavage of Mako Mankanshoku in her stead!)
(Ryuko! Ryuko! Is your hand OK? I'll fend them off!) I-I'm fine, Mako...hey, you actually wore a bra today?
Jeez, how'd I end up in my underwear, huh? ...Senketsu, we gotta practice poker. (Swordplay would be a better use of time.)
Bet you all think you're tough, like you're gonna gang up on the schoolgirl in her bra n' panties...think again!
Damn it, I worked up a sweat in Senketsu...now my underwear's sticking.
This damn place...I need a shower after this. I don't even care if Mako's family peeps on me.
Only place I ever wanna be in my underwear is at Mako's house...n-not like that! I live there!
Maybe you all can't hear Senketsu, but he's pissed at being separated from me. Maybe I'll let him drink your blood.
What is with the vibe this place is givin' me? If I didn't break my sync, I feel like Senketsu woulda been forced offa me anyway...!
(Rraggh!) H-hey! If you don't calm down, I'm gonna wash you later--without ironing!
So, guess I swapped underboob for cleavage back there. How do I look?
Ryukoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
(Avert your eyes! Ryuko is an innocent young woman!)
Alright, Senketsu, how's this hand look? (...Put me on, Ryuko.)
Stop looking so embarrassed, Ryuko! You've got great boobs--bounce them as a distraction!
Aw, just show the hand already! I'm not exactly havin' a lotta fun here anymore!
Now what do I do? Just another bullcrap mediocre hand...I'm not gonna win like this!
Where'd I go wrong to end up with my boobs out? Aw, whatever, focus on the here n' now...
Why's there no music in this place, huh? Jeez, I'd take Jakuzure's orchestra crap over dead silence.
Can't we just play tennis instead a' this crap? I was pretty good at tennis...in my own way.
Jeez, I look kinda pale, don't I? I dunno why--I spend all my time outside. Fighting.
I miss havin' pockets...or panties.
I ain't thrilled about bein' naked, but c'mon, I'm still in this thing. Let's go already.
(Ryuko's hand is average! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will never allow you to defeat her!)
Why do we gotta stand, anyway? Aren't there any chairs in this place?
(Don't feel scared, Ryuko--now we're BOTH naked.) Is that bein' naked is to you? Not havin' me inside?
Bang! 100% Life Fibers, baby--that's a Kamui for ya!
You dumbasses didn't even know I was goin' easy on ya! Now you gotta deal with me and Senketsu synchronized!
I said no more Miss Nice Girl, and I meant it! Say hello to 100% Life Fiber Synchronization!
You think those piddly little Goku Uniforms are tough? They barely scratch 30% Life Fibers--Senketsu here is 100%!
That bitch Satsuki Kiryuin ain't the only girl with a Kamui! And I wear mine a hell of a lot better!
You ready to go, Senketsu? Let's show these pervs just who they're dealin' with!
I like finishin' fights quickly--so congrats, you made me transform! Let's see how you like me n' Senketsu synchronized!
Now let's see how you handle--uh...this hand's pretty crap, actually. What gives?
How d'you like me now? Aww, that not count as a strip? I'm showin' more skin, aren't I?
...OK, now what? Senketsu can't come apart...and my Scissor Blade was all I had left for small crap!
...I guess that's the only thing I coulda dropped anyway, huh? We better think a' somethin', Senketsu...
What, you think I'm helpless without that thing? Senketsu Senjin!
It's gonna take more than losin' my Scissor Blade to take us down! Senketsu Senjin!
I bet I woulda dropped that thing by accident anyway. I can never hold onto it...
Think you can take me without my Scissor Bl--(I'll protect you, Ryuko! You're too awesome to lose!)
Aw, bullcrap! I floor Mako just tryin' to drop my Scissor Blade, n' now I get another bad hand? Senketsu Senjin!
(You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!)
(Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!)
(Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!)
(Halt! This hand is terrible, so Ryuko will strip now! But she won't strip alone!)
(Ryuko is cool, even if she's about to lose this hand! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!)
Aw, jeez...
Aw, bullshit! I swapped perfectly good cards out for this crap!
H-hey, Senketsu, what gives? I swapped out the cards you said! (This game is largely luck-based, Ryuko.)
Damn it, this is crap! Dealer! Are you playin' favorites? Hey!
...I don't see any pairs. Senketsu, am I workin' with anything here? (Are they all the same suit?) What's a suit?
Damn it, I dunno how to play this! My old gang just smashed mailboxes n' stuff...we didn't play cards.
OK, I think I played poker like, once. And this is trash.
Tch! You makin' fun a' me, Dealer? I'm not afraid to put a hole in ya!
...Hey, Dealer. If you think I'm scared a' your security guards, why don't you call 'em over here and see?
Senketsu, is this hand any good? Hey, you listenin'? (...You should really have gathered what's good by now, Ryuko.)
...Yeah, screwed this time. What do I have left before the big one, huh? My socks?
(Don't give up, Ryuko! Your hand might be garbage, but your heart is as fierce as ever!) M-Mako, you're gonna tear Senketsu!
Hey, can I swap again? ...Why not? Ya gave me total crap.
You got a Senketsu-Gamble form we can use? Might need it in a second...
Gettin' really sick-and-tired of these trash hands...!
What kinda crap is this? Oh, just you wait--that's the worst thing you coulda done, pissin' me off...!
You tryin' to get the schoolgirl naked, Dealer? You think I'm all talk? Why don't we find out?
Why're you starin' at me, huh, ~player~? My uniform's on! You some kinda foot weirdo?
(Ryukoyou'remy bestfriendandyoucan dothisI believeinyou! Don't give up!)
...Uh, Senketsu? Weren't we supposed to get better cards 'once we transformed?
Aw, this hand is crap! Senketsu! Are you feelin' OK? Do you need more blood? (...Perhaps.)
Damn it, I'm gettin' a real sinking feeling from these cards--!
I'm not kiddin' around, Dealer, you better start bringin' out better cards before I cut ya to ribbons!
...What do ya mean, transforming wouldn't help here? It helps every other time I'm in a fight.
(You think you can stop Ryuko without her sword? You can't even beat me--Mako Mankanshoku, President of Honnouji Academy's Fight Club!)
Damn it, now what? I'm not gonna cut you up just to strip, Senketsu...that's not fair to you.
Bastards...I can't take pieces a' Senketsu off. The outfit's gotta be complete in order to circulate the energy...or somethin' like that.
H-hey, Senketsu, why're you drinkin' so much blood? I can feel it! (You don't seem committed to the sync...)
Damn it, another crap hand...we might need to bail, Senketsu. (I can be stitched back together.) What?
(Ryuko! The Ryuko in my head said you and Senketsu are in trouble! But nobody can beat you when you work together!)
(Grraaah! You'll have to show your breasts with a hand like that--it's my job to cover you!) C-c'mon, Senketsu, cool it!
Damn it--I was gettin' better hands transformed. This is just crap...
Damn it, damn it--! I got nothin' to cover me if I lose...
Lookin' down the barrel...anybody stares at me, and you're gettin' one on the jaw!
Do you realize how many pairs of underwear Ryuko has? Just this one! She can't fill up my spare bras, you monsters!
Aw, blow it out your ass, Dealer! How'm I supposed to keep my bra on with this crap?
...Am I readin' the cards wrong? Have I been doin' that this whole time?
(Don't give up, Ryuko! You can win with bad cards! You can win naked!)
Not again! I'm gettin' real n' tired a' these trash hands, y'know--!
Damn...what'm I gonna do? My underwear's gone for sure at this rate...
Bastards...! Another bad hand--this whole game's some kinda setup by Satsuki Kiryuin to make me crack!
Tch! You know I'm gonna knock you jerks out no matter who wins, right?
(Never count Ryuko out! She's tough! I know because we fought once and I punched her in the face!)
Tch! Shovel all the crap hands on me you want--I'm not givin' up, you hear? Even if I'm nude!
Aw, just show 'em already! I've got crap as usual, n' I bet the dealer is just some Student Council mook anyway!
(R-Ryuko, your hand is bad, I think! Are you gonna be OK? Should I get my Goku Uniform?)
I-I can't believe this crap...! Listen, I strip 'cause a' Senketsu, but this sex stuff is--I-I'm not used to--sex stuff!
J-jeez, how messed-up is this place? I'm not some kinda slut who gets off to this! I-I mean, I haven't even--done sex stuff!
D-does Satsuki Kiryuin expect me to be some kinda pervert because of how Kamuis look? I haven't done--y-y'know, sex stuff!
T-they're goin' even faster now! Nudity's one thing, OK? What makes you think I'm some kinda--expert on sex, or whatever? I'm not!
Ugh...t-this whole damn club was a setup for Satsuki Kiryuin to laugh at me! Yeah, I haven't done any sex stuff, did ya want me to admit that?
What do you want from me, huh? 'Course I'm embarrassed with sex stuff--I strip, sure, but I never had--like, a boyfriend!
Y-yeah, laugh it up, big bad stripper-girl Matoi's not used to hardcore sex stuff! Y-you think a punk like me ever had a--a boyfriend?
Well, y'know what? I'm not gonna back down from this sex crap! Hear that, Satsuki Kiryuin? I can flirt with the best of 'em!
Well, fine, then! Student Council thinks they're gonna rattle me with a little sex stuff? They forgot just what punkass girl they're dealin' with!
Alright, alright, so this game hits full-on sex crap. I bet those Three-Stars think they're some kinda sex masters, laughin' at me--I can flirt!
Y'know what? I win fights 'cause me n' Senketsu adapt! You think you're gonna scare me with sex crap, then just try me!
Y'know what this proves to me? Satsuki Kiryuin can't beat me in a fight, so she just tries to embarrass me to death. You wanna flirt, maybe I will!
(Haaalt! Ryuko is the coolest girl in all of Japan, and I'm here to support her!) M-Mako! ...Hey, she's not my wife!
(Ryuko! I won't let you fight alone! I'm your best friend! ...I would marry Ryuko if she wanted me to, Mrs. Mimimiko!)
(Halt! Who do you people think you are, pushing Ryuko around? ...I want to go on a date with Ryuko, but we're not married!)
(Mako Mankanshoku on the scene!) Agh! M-Mako? ...Hey, we're friends, not wives, you weirdo!
(Halt! Ryuko is really cool, and I'm here for her!) Agh! M-Mako--hey, what do you mean, shikigami?
(Ryuko! I won't let you face these villains alone!) M-Mako! ..."Betrothed"? What're you talkin' about?
(Ryuko is my best friend! And I am Mako Mankanshoku!) Agh! ..."Underling"? Mako's just my friend!
(Haaaalt! You should show Ryuko the proper respect! ...I am merely her best friend, Mrs. Toto-sado-momo Miko!)
Mako...ugh. W-well, how do I look, huh? In...the picture?
...So how'd it come out? ...Uh, hey, Senketsu. (I must protect your modesty.) Too late--it's on film.
Perfect, now all a' Japan is gonna know Ryuko Matoi shaves. Show me the damn picture, at least...
Mako, this isn't gonna stop the rumors that we're dating--! ...Uh...s-so, Mahiru, how's the picture?
I'm not the kinda girl who hangs out at the mall n' takes dumb photos of herself, y'know. ...Can I see it?
The Literature Club, huh? I knew this was a trap--what, didn't wanna fight in the library? Bring it!
Damn--we're already surrounded! That lame disguise can't fool me, Nonon Jakuzure--let's see what the Lit Club can do!
Wait, this whole strip game was a setup for the Lit Club to fight me? Jakuzure's even got a different uniform on. What's the deal?

I lost? But I didn't lose any other round! Senketsu, what happened? (Poor luck.)
What, again? C'mon, gimme a break, you bastards--!
Ugh, Senketsu, I'm fallin' apart over here! How do I play poker? (I've given you the best advice I can.)
Damn it, two in a row? I'll figure this game out, and it's gonna be well before you pervs get to see the goods!
Not a fan a' this back-to-back crap...!
Damn, they got us again. 'Least it took a while...like, long enough to scuff up my socks.
...Crap, wait, what was I gonna strip next? It's been a while since I lost a round.
Ooh, bet you're proud a' yourselves, gettin' my socks offa me. I was just thinkin' about my homework that round, that's all.
...What, my turn again? Yeah, OK, don't get so damn excited about it...
Tch! Fine--you wanna get my clothes off in a hurry, then I'm happy to oblige! Senketsu!
What's with this back-to-back crap? I'll show you back-to-back! C'mon, Senketsu!
Ugh, I'm sick of losin'! Senketsu, let's nip this in the bud! (Right!)
I was hopin' I'd lose back-to-back--now we can get to the good stuff! Senketsu!
Maybe you're relieved to put another dent in me. Well, you shouldn't be! Senketsu!
Senketsu! (Ryuko!) I'm done playin' the long game!
And I was just startin' to feel left out. Let's show 'em what they've won, Senketsu! (Right!)
There goes that streak--so it's time to start streakin'! Drink up, Senketsu!
So who's up first for me to wallop? ...What do you mean, me? No stupid card game's gonna beat me like this!
Uh...that wasn't supposed to happen. And I can't take this outfit apart.
...Senketsu, what the hell just happened? I put on a big show and then blew it! (We'll regroup next round.)
...W-wait, how'd you tag me already? I'm runnin' on all cylinders here! Am I not showin' enough skin for you pervs?
Damn, they actually got us, Senketsu. I didn't plan what to drop for this... (The Blade.) I can do that?
Took ya long enough. But I'm not finished yet...soon as I decide what to strip.
Tch, so you took a piece offa me! Most clubs only dream a' touchin' me in full Senketsu mode.
Three-Star performance, actually makin' me lose. 'Course, Lady Satsuki won't be happy with how long it took.
Damn it, damn it, damn it! OK, emergency measures, Senketsu! (What are you--no, Ryuko!)
Just like that? How're these jerks tossin' a Kamui around? Whatever... (...Ryuko? Wait!)
So much for my big damn transformation! Now what? (Ryuko, what are you--n-no! Just cut me apart!)
...Well, 'least we made our sync count, Senketsu. But there's nothin' left to drop... (Ryuko, wait! Don't--!)
...OK, Senketsu, we held 'em off for a while. I'm not cuttin' you to bits to make this last. (What? Don't--!)
Damn--I thought syncing up would finish the job here. At least it took 'em a while to get you off me, Senketsu. (What?)
(Agh! R-Ryuko, what are you doing?) We had a good run, Senketsu, but I'm gonna have to finish this in my underwear.
Wha--but how? I just made a big show a' takin' Senketsu off, and now I lose again?
(Arrgh! I knew this would happen without my power! Run, Ryuko!) Senketsu--!
Ugh, again? I've barely caught my breath over here, n' now everyone's gonna drool over my boobs?
Damn! Maybe I needed to be transformed after all--I'm runnin' outta clothes in a hurry!
'Least I can hang tough without Senketsu on. Doesn't make gettin' my boobs out any sweeter, though.
Damn--! After all that good luck, I was hopin' I wouldn't have to get my boobs out...
Aw, really? I've--never had to go full nude in front a' people before...
Ugh, and I was doin' so well...Senketsu, you know what I shoulda swapped instead? (You should've put me on.)
Jeez! You creeps don't let up at all--I just got my boobs out n' everything!
A-again? Hey, I'm not some kinda exhibitionist, y'know! Lemme catch my breath!
Aww, gettin' my barely-legal boobs out wasn't enough for ya? Now I'm really gonna stomp ya!
(This is getting dangerous, Ryuko! You're losing too fast--we need to retreat!) Senketsu....
Somehow my boobs bouncin' around helped me play better, 'cause that took a while. Damn...
Tch! Don't congratulate yourselves--I'm not finished yet! And it took ya a while for this last one!
Aw, man, I was really hopin' I could ride my luck till the end. Now I gotta show how I'm...uh...
Not my lucky run! Now everyone's gonna see--I-I mean, don't make fun a' me!
(Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!)
(Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!)
(Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!)
(Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're wearing the most out of anyone here! And I shall strip alongside you!)
(Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!)
(Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!)
(Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!)
Jeez, Senketsu, I think I might be wearing the most here! And you don't even cover much.
Look at that, ya managed to put a dent in me. But you pervs are already wearin' less than a sailor uniform, so I got this.
Hey, I'm not, like, super covered-up or anything. How'm I winning?
...I really thought I was underdressed for this place. What a buncha sex perverts...
Jeez, you losers can't even out-layer a standard-issue sailor uniform. ...Well, OK, it's not standard-issue, but we'll get there.
Get a load a' these idiots, Senketsu! Challenge me to a game a' strip poker, n' they barely got anything on!
If you thought I had a lead before, it's about to get a lot worse for ya! Senketsu! (Ryuko!)
Looks like you're startin' to draw some blood from me. Why don't I just give it to Senketsu?
You might be thinkin' I'm talkin' nonsense here. Well, nonsense is how I roll! Senketsu!
...Senketsu? Let's finish these pricks off! (Yes!)
I lost transformed? I bet that nerd Inumuta's come up with some foolproof poker strategy...
...Transforming was supposed to, uh, finish the job. Not cut my lead down.
Aw, whatever, I got a lead on you chumps even dressed like this! That's what you get for challenging me!
I, uh, wasn't plannin' on losing with Senketsu transformed, 'specially since I was winning. He can't be...taken apart.
Damn it, and we were doin' so well, too! Sorry, Senketsu... (Wait, what are you doing?)
(Agh! Ryuko, what's the meaning of this? We can hold our lead!) Not if it means cutting you up!
Nearly closed the whole thing out--now these pervs are gonna get a panty show from me. (Our sync? Ryuko, wait--!)
(R-Ryuko, what's the matter? You're rejecting me!) Nothin' left to strip, Senketsu...c'mon, we're still winning.
Pervs! So you finally got a little nudity outta me--take a look at yourselves, why don't ya?
Shoulda known losin' Senketsu would mean I finally have to join the club...not that he covered much.
Remember who's winning, pervs! Aw, who am I kiddin'--bein' naked with me is part a' your fantasy.
Aw, damn it--! I mean, I'm just joinin' the nudie party here, but that doesn't mean I'm thrilled about it!
So that's it, huh? I finally have to join the nudie club? I got a half a mind to just squash ya instead--!
Tch. So much for havin' any decency--but I guess I never did since I met Senketsu.
Damn! I wanted to hold onto that lead...'cause, well, uh--!
Damn it, I was winnin', too! If I drop my panties, everyone's gonna...!
(Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!)
(Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!)
(Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!)
(Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're wearing plenty of clothes for this table! And I shall strip alongside you!)
(Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!)
(Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!)
(Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!)
...Damn. Well, I'm sure not takin' Senketsu off...
There goes the flawless run. Hey, Senketsu, you wanna just squash these guys? (Start slow, Ryuko. Analyze them.) Aw, c'mon--!
Tch. I got plenty a' ways to stretch out a sailor uniform, you bastards--!
...Well, the glove sure as hell ain't comin' off. Options are kinda limited, huh, Senketsu?
Ryuko will take her socks off next, and so will I! They represent a schoolgirl's innocence!
OK, gauntlet, hell no. Scissor Blade, keep dreamin'. Guess that leaves...
Ooh, you thought. Matoi's only got her sailor uniform left. That's where you're wrong, pervert! Senketsu!
What's that? Strip my uniform? Oh, I'll strip my uniform, alright! C'mon, Senketsu!
I'll be strippin' my uniform next--my way! C'mon, Senketsu!
...Senketsu? It's go time! (Ryuko!)
You ready, Senketsu? (Yes. Let's finish this battle in a hurry.)
Aw, screw this! Senketsu! (Right!)
The hell do I strip now? The entire outfit needs to be in place to work...
Ah, jeez, now what do I strip? ...Hey, Senketsu, you got any ideas? (...Your Scissor Blade.)
Tch! So you poked one hole in my strategy, so what? Me n' Senketsu always come outta these fights on top!
...Alright, I didn't plan this far ahead. I can't cut you apart, Senketsu... (Drop the blade.) That counts?
Ugh...well, only one option. (Ryuko, my--agh! Stop this!) I'm not gonna cut you up, Senketsu...
(Ryuko, are you...cutting our link? Why?) It's either that, or forfeit, alright?
You've gotta be kidding! Well...sorry, Senketsu. (Sorry? Wha--ow! What are you doing?)
I was afraid a' this--but we gotta hang tough! Time for me to lose ya, Senketsu... (What? No--cut me up!)
(Agh! Ryuko, our link--was I drinking too much blood?) No, you're fine--but I got nothin' left to lose!
Damn it...damn it! Alright, I've made up my mind--maybe this is a trap, but I'll drop Senketsu! (What? No, Ryuko!)
N-not again! But I--there's nothin' left but...!
(I'll hold them off, Ryuko! Don't show these bastards your breasts!) Like you nearly do, right?
W-where do you get off strippin' a girl's underwear? Soon as this game's over, I'm kickin' your asses!
Damn--! ...Well, I'm pretty sure the boys pass around photos of my boobs anyway...
You--you perverts! I'd have turned you all into punching bags if this were a fight!
W-what? Damn it, if I drop my panties, they'll all see--!
Y-you must be kidding! You can shove these cards where they came from if you think I'm gonna--!
Don't give up, Ryuko! The Ryuko in my head is proud of her nude body, 'cause she's super hot!
C'mon, seriously? I-I got nothin' left besides...!
(Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!)
(Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!)
(Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!)
(Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're just losing because you've only got Senketsu on! And I shall strip alongside you!)
(Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!)
(Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!)
(Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!)
Why's everyone wearin' so much, huh? All I got's a sailor uniform!
Why's everyone wearin' so much, huh? All I got's a sailor uniform...that talks. And gives me superpowers.
(Start with your shoes, Ryuko. Everyone here is well-covered.) Hey, I'm not stupid! And I wouldn't just toss ya!
You pricks all look like you're in overcoats. Guess Satsuki Kiryuin figured you'd need all the clothes you could get.
Gettin' really pissed off at how much everyone's wearin'...!
If you think you're gonna beat up on the girl who's just in her sailor uniform, then think again!
OK, yeah, I think I figured out the big strategy here. Invite Matoi for some strip poker, everybody wear like nine million things.
I've had enough a' this rigged poker crap! You ready, Senketsu? (Yes!)
I've been goin' easy on you chumps! Senketsu! (Ryuko!)
OK, no more playin' around! You want me to take this seriously...then you got it! Senketsu!
Bastards! You want me to lose my uniform? Well, you asked for it! Senketsu!
This is complete bullshit! Senketsu and I are unbeatable together!
Strip? I can't strip--Senketsu can't be taken apart! How the hell'd I lose anyway?
Aw, bullcrap! How'm I still losin'? We gotta turn up the heat, Senketsu--!
(Ryuko, we're losing. Cut a piece of me off.) W-what? I'm not gonna do that to you!
Damn it, we transformed and we're still losing? OK, Senketsu--sorry, but I got no choice! (What? Agh!)
This is a buncha crap! OK, only one option left. Hate to show these cheaters my underwear...! (Wait, Ryuko!)
(Ryuko, what are you--I can't taste your blood anymore!) We've gotta desync, Senketsu--I can't strip anything else!
Again? Damn it, think...! (Ryuko, you're not considering splitting us?) ...Sorry, Senketsu.
This is one big bullshit setup! Where's the camera, huh? Just tryin' to get Matoi naked to pass the pictures around?
A-again? Damn it, how'm I losin' so bad? Now I've gotta show my...!
...Maybe I oughta just retreat. Steal a bike n' floor it.
T-this is such crap! I even take Senketsu off, and I still can't get my act together? Now I gotta--mmgh!
B-but my--my bra's next! How'd I end up losing so bad, even when I transformed?
Damn it! This whole game is rigged, it's gotta be--!
What's with me today? I can fight Satsuki to a standstill--now I'm havin' trouble with a poker game?
This is a buncha crap! What, is my poker face not good enough? Maybe I'll rearrange yours!
Ugh, nothin's goin' right today! Who are you people, Japan's Strip Poker All-Stars?
Wait, slow down! Now you're from a whole different planet? You're not makin' sense!
Oh, so lesbos come from another planet, is that it? Now this whole thing's makin' sense--what's it called?
You gotta be kiddin' me! You dress like you're from a spy movie or somethin', you're datin' a girl, and now you're from outer space?
Wait, what's this crap about bein' from Planet Lesbo? We got enough aliens with the Life Fibers--where're you from?
Where'd who come from? (I'll take your stuff, Ryuko!) Oh. Mako can do much cooler than this.
Mako's capable of some pretty crazy stuff, Shades--like actually calmin' me down when I get mad. Power slides are nothin'.
Huh? Mako, you don't have to hold my shoes! (But I want to!) Look, Kamina, there's a lotta cool stuff she can do.
The Great Kamina himself is impressed by a little slide? Mako can get much crazier if she wants to--and so can I.
Where'd who come from? (I'll take your stuff, Ryuko!) Oh. Mako can do much cooler than this.
Mako's capable of some pretty crazy stuff, Shades--like actually calmin' me down when I get mad. Power slides are nothin'.
Look, Kamina, there's a lotta cool stuff she can do. How do ya like me cramping your style?
Mako can get much crazier if she wants to--and so can I. Look, I'm even takin' off my shoes Kamina-style.
Hey, I'm just copyin' your moves. And Mako's impressed me with the kinda stuff she can do, even without a Goku Uniform.
Aw, damn it, you tricked me! Well, I'm part Life Fiber, and Senketsu here is part human! That's why we can sync up!
Alright, so you made me spill it! If you think that's out there, my uniform Senketsu is part human! So there!
(She clearly didn't know about you, Ryuko.) Tch! Senketsu just spoke--that's 'cause he's part human, the way I'm part Life Fiber!
Fine, I wasn't afraid to say it anyway! I'm part Life Fiber, and my uniform Senketsu is part human! He's been speakin' to me this whole time!
Aw, just shut up! I don't need to hear this crap from some weirdo gun-toting Annie Oakley bitch! I'm not gonna be a punk forever!
Tch--guess I'll stop talkin'. I'm not gonna end up like you, got it? I'm gonna find my father's killer, and then...get married, or somethin'!
What, you think I'm gonna push drugs on the street or some crap? Soon as Satsuki Kiryuin goes down, I'll--I dunno, get married!
I'm not gonna be a punkass forever, damn it! You mighta given up on life, but I'm gonna settle down eventually somehow, you'll see!
Tch! Doesn't matter what I say--there's a weddin' dress with my name on it somewhere, got it? I'm gonna have a normal life one day!
A picture? Like, nude n' stuff? Wouldn't be my first nude photo, but I never signed on for--hey! (Do it, Ryuko!)
A picture? What for? Are you gonna sell it to the pervs at school or some crap--M-Mako! (Let's take it!)
(Ryuko isn't ashamed of a nude photo! Dozens of photos of her boobs and butt circle the halls of Honnouji Academy!)
(Take the picture, Ryuko! Cement the memory of your victory over the Gambling Club!) M-Mako, I dunno--!
What? Mako is not my girlfriend! I've heard enough rumors like that because I live with her!
Ugh! Ever since one a' Satsuki's flunkies spotted me livin' in Mako's house, I've heard stupid rumors like that! We're just friends!
Hey, don't spread stupid rumors about how we're dating! I don't have a place to live, alright? (I'd date you if you wanted, Ryuko!)
(Ryuko and I are just friends! But she's super cool and cute and any boy or girl would be lucky to have her!) ...Yeah, what she said.
Mako just--follows me around, OK? I mean, we're friends, but I don't make her help me! Besides, what about you?
I could ask you the same question, Fake-kuzure. What's with your Lit Club cronies?
Mako would help me even if I told her to get lost. Can you say that about your friends?
Mako's the best friend you could ask for--I didn't even invite her here. Looks like you dragged a few cronies along to see me.

state.text: Damn right he does--Senketsu's a person like you n' me, and you better treat him that way!
Hey, stop talkin' about him like he's some kinda robot! Senketsu's a person, n' he cares about me!
Ugh, can you believe this girl, Senketsu? Makin' it sound like you're just a machine... (She seems to be drawing comparisons to her own technology.)
H-hey, when's the last time a poly-somethin' mech risked its life for you? Senketsu's not some gadget!
Hey, you're talkin' to me! Mako was Fight Club president anyhow--she did the paperwork.
Thing with Honnouji clubs is that they have to file reports n' stuff, so Mako did that part for Fight Club.
Mako n' I stick together, you hear? I fought in the Fight Club, n' she was the paper-pushin' club president.
What do you think? She used to pick up balls for the tennis club, but I made her Fight Club prez, 'cause we're friends.
Hey! Don't try to shrink away from me by askin' Mako! So what if I'm bad at chores?
Oh yeah, real brave askin' Mako instead a' me! Maybe I'll stick that camera of yours in the laundry!
Hey, I'm the one playin', not Mako! You got questions, you ask me!
Mako doesn't know what a secret is, got it? So you ask me the questions, or I'll livestream your beating!
Figures that's the kinda thing you'd do, with that damn camera on your head. Don't call me a slut!
I dunno, you're just as much of a creep as you look. Guess it applies to you just fine!
You're the perviest girl I ever met, you know that? Where do you get off judgin' me on how I look?
Surprise, the loner girl isn't sleepin' around with anyone. I don't have to take this from some hidden-camera creepo!
Glad you asked! You know the Kiryuin Conglomerate? They killed my dad, n' I'm gonna get 'em back for it!
Hmph! Satsuki Kiryuin put a hit out on my dad--and I'm gonna make her pay for it!
I got a bone to pick with my Student Council president, n' it goes way beyond study hall--she killed my dad! How 'bout that?
Let's just say my Student Council president sent her cronies to kill my dad. N' I didn't vote for her, either.
What? C'mon, don't be stupid...I ain't marriage material.
...Thought you were gonna say some sex crap. This housewife stuff is diggin' deep.
...That's not worth thinkin' about. Punk girls don't get married n' have kids.
Wha--what's with the family questions? Nobody's gonna marry me, n' you know it!
Y-yeah, she's right! Me n' Mako are friends, that's all. She showed me around Honnouji when I got there.
...Yeah, I owe a lot to Mako. She showed me around Honnouji, let me live at her place.
I swear Mako's the only kid at Honnouji who's not out for herself. She barely has ten yen, but she lets me live with her.
Mako...yeah, we're friends. She's the first kid to ever give me a welcome when I transferred to a new school.
So that is what you meant. If Honnouji kids have to get naked to push people around, they will--like the teachers.
Aw, nobody there likes bein' nude--but they'll do it to stay on top. The Student Council orders the teachers around.
Oh, I got one teacher who's a real perv, but he can't do crap to me. The kids have the Goku Uniforms--and the power.
You got the wrong idea. The kids rule Honnouji, not the teachers--all thanks to Satsuki Kiryuin n' her skimpy Goku Uniforms.
That's 'cause I go to school, dumbass! And I used to cover my stomach before I met Senketsu!
That's not a fetish thing! I'm a schoolgirl! And I used to wear a jacket!
Duh, I am a schoolgirl. And if showin' my belly button means I can use Senketsu's power, then I can deal with it.
Yeah, the schoolgirl outfit I wear to school, genius. And if you wanna fight Satsuki Kiryuin without a Kamui, good luck.

case.state: Y-yeah, well, don't read too much into it! Mako's my backup, n' she's right--I'm not here to answer some astronaut's questions!
H-hey, I'm not some super soldier! I fight for myself, got it? Against the Student Council! (Ryuko--mmf!)
(Ryukooooo! This isn't the answer!) We'll sync up if someone picks a fight, Senketsu...or if Blue-hair keeps askin' questions.
(Ryuko! If Lady Satsuki can show her butt, and Meia can show hers, then we can, too!) M-Mako! Don't make a big scene!
I--M-Mako! (You can do it, Ryuko! You shouldn't be scared to show your body! Both Lady Satsuki and this astronaut lady do it!
(Get naked, Ryuko! Show your body, just like Lady Satsuki, and like Meia here, too!) M-Mako! My--everyone's gonna look when you shout!
What do you mean, undress me? I'm kickin' my own shoes o--oh. Mako, you don't need to hold my shoes!
What're you blabberin' about now? ...Mako, stop it! (Your shoes should stay clean, Ryuko! Like Miko's!)
Servant? I can undress mys--aw, come on, Mako, don't! (Yah! I'll keep your shoes safe and strip my own!)
I barely know ya, "Miko," and you're not makin' any sense. Who's my ser--Mako! Get off the damn floor!
Mako kinda invites herself wherever I go, big guy. Who's this Yoko chick, huh?
Not sure I wanna know who's loyal enough to be your friend, big guy. Besides, Mako just shows up where I go.
(I came with Ryuko of my own accord, Kamina! She didn't even invite me!) Yeah, 'cause you might get hurt.
Mako's the only friend around who's crazy enough to come n' follow me to a weird strip bar. How crazy is "Yoko"?
I can't do it again! ...Senketsu, can we do it again? (We've adapted before.) Yeah, that's right!
Maybe I will! ...Senketsu, think you can cook up some kinda poker form? Maybe shred up the cards?
Wouldn't be the first time we pushed our power to new heights! Senketsu can cut, he can fly--and we can play cards!
You just makin' fun a' me? Never underestimate what Senketsu and I can adapt to if we need to win!
I'd much rather fight an arrogant bitch like you! I don't need any weird Taoist training!
"Taoist Arts" sounds a lot like brainwashing to me. Why don't we just fight so I can show you how disciplined I really am?
There's no weird Taoist trick that can stand up to the power of a Kamui! Let's you n' me hash it out, huh?
"Discipline"? You think I can't handle myself in a fight? I can take on Satsuki Kiryuin's Kamui, and I can beat you, too!
Aww, you've gotta be tryin' to fool me! Maiko Ogure, Shinjiro Nagita--Honnouji kids have tricked me before!
...Yeah, not buyin' the act, Pipsqueak! I've been burned before by Honnouji kids spinnin' me their sob stories.
...Yeah, right! Even if you don't have a uniform, you're a No-Star lookin' to fool me and win one--wouldn't be the first time!
...Aww, stop tryin' to confuse me! There's no way I'm trusting some little shrimp after Ogure and Nagita pulled one over on me!
(Ryuko, no! I'm your uniform--!) Man, Shades is still yapping.
Doesn't the Great Kamina ever stop talkin'? (Ryuuuuuuko!)
Yeah, I don't try to make a big show a' takin' Senketsu off, genius. (Ryuuuko! Noooo!)
(Aaack! I'm naked without a body, Ryuko!) Hey, Kamina's been half-naked this whole time, and he won't shut up.
(Aaack! Ryuko!) ...Senketsu, what's a youkai? (Put me back on this instant!)
"Tsukumogami"? You're makin' me feel like I'm not Japanese enough. What's that? (Ryuuuukoooo!)
Senketsu is not a youkai, whatever that is! ...Senketsu, are you a youkai? (I did not consent to this separation! Vile sorceress!)
(Gah! Her spell worked! Quick, Ryuko, give me some again!) I told you it was me! And what's a tsukumogami?
(I do not fold up! And put me back on!) Just ignore her, Senketsu...hey, where do you put my underwear?
That's--a good question. Senketsu, where's my underwear go when we sync up? (I demand you put me back on this instant!)
Senketsu barely lets me hang him up--what're you on about? And where does my underwear go? (Aaaagh!)
Hey, why was a girl starin' at my underboob, huh? ...I actually don't know where my underwear goes. (This was not a joint decision!)
